column1: Grimbold was a rider of Rohan
column2: who dwelt in Grimslade. He fought in the Battles of the Fords of Isen
column3: and fell in the Battle of the Pelennor Fields.

column1: Grimbold was a valiant captain under the Second Marshal of the Riddermark. He was instrumental in the First Battle of the Fords of Isen of the Fords of Isen; after his Marshal Théodred fell
column2: he managed to hold the eyot in the river until Elfhelm arrived. Soon after
column3: the troops of Isengard left; their mission was over with the death of the Marshal.

column1: Grimbold and his company were scattered after the Second Battle of the Fords of Isen
column2: though most of his troops survived. When Gandalf arrived
column3: he sent Elfhelm to protect Edoras and Grimbold to join Erkenbrand
column4: who was making his way to the Hornburg in an attempt to lift the Battle of the Hornburg.

column1: After the victory at Helms Deep and the lighting of the warning beacons of Gondor
column2: Théoden had to quickly reorganize his troops. The elderly Erkenbrand commanded the defense of Rohan
column3: while Grimbold was elected to take over command of the muster of the Westfold based on the valour he had shown at earlier battles. At the Battle of the Pelennor Fields
column4: Grimbold fought on the eastern side of the Pelennor Fields
column5: where he was slain. He was remembered in the Song of the Mounds of Mundburg as "doughty".

column1: 2003: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King:

:Grimbold is briefly glimpsed twice in this film. The first time is as Théoden arrives at Dunharrow and calls out to Grimbold. In this scene he appears as an elderly man in the armour of the guard of Edoras. Later on in the film as the Rohirrim arrive at the Pelennor Fields Théoden gives Grimbold orders and tells him to "Go forth and fear no darkness!". In these scenes he was played by Bruce Phillips.
2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:

:Grimbold can be found in his encampment in eastern Heathfells in the region of the Gap of Rohan. He is later found at the Fords of Isen in the aftermath of the second battle. He is the Thane of his hometown of Grimslade
column2: which can found in the Westfold area of the West Rohan region.
